Reviews.Title: A good TV for narrower spaces, with high-tech, logically placed controls. Made in North America.
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: We were looking for the largest TV possible to fit a cabinet in our master bedroom.  This model fit with 1/10 of an inch to spare.  To accomplish this we had to have buttons on the bottom or front, not on the sides. The buttons on this model are actual touch controls along the bottom front bezel which give a sleek, smooth look and seem to work well.The picture quality is excellent through the HDMI connector from AT&T;'s Uverse service. The remote was easy to setup - be sure to look under the HDTV section of your manual remote.The sound is very good, though it lacks some bass -- which is to be expected for a panel this thin.  If you must have perfect sound, I'd suggest investing in a sound-bar or surround system you can hook up to your input source.We liked all of the controls and settings it provides -- for instance you can even decide how the power LED functions.  We like the fact you can turn the LED off if you are using it a bedroom.  LG did a good job on the layout of the on-screen menus and the buttons.  The Picture Wizard is a fun way to adjust the picture quality  The TV even has a manual and online-help within its menus..This model seems to be similar to 24LN4510 except it uses about 10% less energy.  I could not confirm any other differences, so see the reviews of that model for other thoughts.For those who care, our new LG 24LN451B 24 inch LED TV was made in Mexico.

Reviews.Title: Is this a TV or a heater?
Reviews.Author: Jamie Richardson "Wife, Mother, Writer"
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a Christmas gift for our daughter who wanted a TV in her room for Netflix. It was the right size and price when on sale before Christmas. It has a good picture quality, and it was easy enough to set up, but this unit puts off a massive amount of heat if used for any amount of time. There is honestly a good 7-10 degree difference between her room and her brothers' room after a single movie... with the bedroom door open. The unit itself isn't hot (it's not a fire hazard), but it just gives off a lot of heat.I would only purchase this set if it will be used in an open area.

Reviews.Title: Decent small TV
Reviews.Author: inthedark
Reviews.Content: I haven't put this though its paces yet but I like it so far. Picture is good (720p), color is decent, and most impressive is the sound, plenty loud with good quality for this size screen. The controls on the remote are a little funky with 3 buttons bringing up the same settings menu but the menus are easy to learn and use. Initial setup is intuitive and fast. Auto tune found the DISH receiver channel with no problem and set the tv to it. Good value.

Reviews.Title: nice color and good audio
Reviews.Author: Josue
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my 11 year old sister to keep her off the living room. She watches her cartoons in it and never complains about it so I'm happy with the product, is energy efficient and good performance

Reviews.Title: Good TV for price
Reviews.Author: M. Everton "yakmaster"
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our bedroom and it is more than adequate for that purpose.  Our only regret is that we did not move up a little in size.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for guest room
Reviews.Author: Adenise58
Reviews.Content: TV was packaged well and arrived on time.  I am using it for a guest bedroom.  The setup was easy and the TV has a great picture.  It really won't be used much but I thought it was a good size just to have in guest room.  Easy to operate with good features.  The stand seems durable and so far all is well with the TV.

Reviews.Title: Good value for price
Reviews.Author: sbb
Reviews.Content: Great picture for a small, reasonably-priced tv.  This is the second LG tv I've purchased (first was in Dec 2013) and the settings are not only user-friendly, but are non-tech easy.  The one big drawback (and I'm actually still deciding if I should return the tv for this reason) is the poor maximum volume.  The tv is in my kitchen and It's impossible to hear the tv when water is running on less than full power.

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: Freddie Barger "FB"
Reviews.Content: Fits great on Kitchen counter.  Picture is a little dark if the room is dark or shaded by the cabinets.  Greet TV for the price and very ease to install.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. Smith
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  I just got it hooked up and I need to add I don't have Cable or any devices connected to it.  This TV replaces a 22inch Samsung and what I really like is that they are about the same dimensions.  This TV has a picture that almost goes out to the edge, way more so than Sammy.  The image with just an antenna hookup  is amazing.  The only gripe I have so far is with the remote, it doesn't sit flat on a hard surface but I can live with that.  Highly recommended and I'm impressed with this seller too.  Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Stephanie McClain
Reviews.Content: We bought these for the kids rooms. They are great for a small room. No problem with viewing angle, great range of sound. The kids love them ...as I am sure our electric bill will too now that we have finally gotten rid of all old school televisions in the house.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV- especially without Cable connection
Reviews.Author: mari55
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a spare bedroom where there is no cable hook-up.  I just have an antenna attached to it and the picture is clearer than my TV in my bedroom which is connected to cable.  Best little TV I have seen yet- and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Betty Richards
Reviews.Content: I love every thing about it.  Works like a charm.  Ideal for my guest bedroom. And it was such a low price!

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: Frustrated Rider
Reviews.Content: perfect television for small room or bedroom.  Great picture and the sound is ok for it's size.  I would definitely recommend this TV especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: LG 24" TV
Reviews.Author: JEROME R. WROBEL
Reviews.Content: Its an LG tv and does everything very well just as I expected it to. I love the picture and features LG builds into their sets. I bought this set to replace the one in my kitchen so I can use the LG tv guide feature which shows the progress of a program.  I also have the LG 47" 3d led set which is also outstanding.  The only tiny complaint I have is I would like a dedicated sleep button on the remote instead of have to go to a menu first. Not a big deal. I recommend LG to my friends now.  They even included a screwdriver to attach the base in case someone doesn't have one handy. The INFO menu has a bar showing the progress of a program so the viewer can see instantly if he has tuned into the beginning of a show or worse just at the very end-- very useful to avoid watching something that is just about to end.

Reviews.Title: Nice 2nd tv
Reviews.Author: Cat Mommy58
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for the bedroom.  Nice pic and all but the volume on it is kind of low.  Not sure if its the fault of the tv or the cable box.  Don't need real loud for the bedroom anyway but you may not like it for your main tv.  Very lightweight and easy to  move around.  I'm disabled and had no problem carrying it when it arrived.  Only thing we dont like is the low volume, that why only 4 stars

Reviews.Title: Bought 2
Reviews.Author: Charles D. Martin "dzldan"
Reviews.Content: Actually bought these to be monitors since they had HDMI. Needed that for the sound running off a HDMI splitter to use as monitors for a security system. Works great for my application. Was cheaper than buying two monitors

Reviews.Title: Neat gift
Reviews.Author: oldman
Reviews.Content: Bought the tv for my grand-daughter for Christmas. She loves it and since it is an LG the tv will probabley last as long as my LG 32 inch, going on  years now with no problems.  Shipping was super fast, the tv arrived 2 days before the delivery date set by Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice Computer Monitor
Reviews.Author: SUDS "SS"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this from a local store a few weeks ago to use as a computer monitor for my mac mini. I was able to find this TV on sale and got it for a slightly better price than the on-line price. For a MAC mini you need a monitor that has an HDMI slot or something equivalent (basically my old flat screen computer monitor would not work with the MAC mini because of the inputs and the type of signal that the MAC puts out vs what the old monitor takes). I do not intend to use this as a TV, but purchased it as a monitor because the price was similar to the price of a monitor and it is a much more flexible product vs just a monitor. We have watched movies in iTunes on this TV/Monitor. We have found the sound and picture to both be of a good quality.
